short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a hide list of homes that you don't want to see in your searches anymore. Whittle them away!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whittle gives you more control to *whittle* down your search for properties/homes on Zillow and Realtor.com!

With Whittle you can:
• Hide properties/homes that you don't want to see anymore in your search results.
• Add notes to properties/homes. Helping you to remember why you like it or hate it!

Hiding (or adding notes to) a property on Zillow will also hide it (and add notes to the same property) on Realtor.com , and vis versa.
